title: Sample Space
text: There are $$8$$ total areas where the arrow can land on.
speech: There are  8  total areas where the arrow can land on.
pacedSpeech: total areas where the arrow can land on.

title: Landing on Yellow or a Consonant
text: There are $$5$$ slices in the circle that the arrow can land on.
speech: There are  5  slices in the circle that the arrow can land on.
pacedSpeech: slices in the circle that the arrow can land on.

title: Complement Rule
text: We can simply subtract $$\frac{5}{8}$$ from $$1$$ to find the probability of not landing on yellow or a consonant.
speech: We can simply subtract  5 eights  from  1  to find the probability of not landing on yellow or a consonant.
pacedSpeech: to find the probability of not landing on yellow or a consonant.
